title: U.S. Is Ramping Up Support In Iraq, But So Is Iran
teaser: President Obama said the U.S. would continue to expand military support to Iraqi forces fighting Sunni extremists. Kate Brannen of Foreign Policy talks to NPR's Arun Rath about Iran's role in Iraq.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
